string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: v0.8: Added pre-downloading of images for offline viewing (set cachesize in options, Notification when Caching finished), Fixed several usability issues (#36 to #38), Fixed Issue #40 (Better error-handling for disabled API and Not logged in error)
v0.7.8: Added HTTP-Authentication (Issue #32), Fixed Issue with display of all articles (Issue #34)

v0.7.7: IMPORTANT: Please update your server to 1.5.0 from http://tt-rss.org/ and visit the TTRSS-Reader\'s project-page for full changelog. If you need to stay with server version 1.4.3.1 you should install TTRSS-Reader v0.7.3 from the project-page.

v0.7.6: New Application-Icon and Overlay-icons for star/publish, Added support for the star/unstar feature, Added support for the published-feature, Fixed display of fresh/starred/published articles in the virtual feeds, Fixed handling of URLs in Article-View, Fixed problems with marking articles as read/unread
v0.7.5: Fixed sorting of categories, Enhanced mediafile download and added notification for finished downloads

v0.7.4: Minor bugs fixed, Better fling-support for headline-list and articles, no recommendation when typing URL, Implemented new API-methods from http://tt-rss.org to avoid the manual hacking, added german localisation
v0.7.3: Problems with API from 1.4.3.1 are (hopefully) resolved. Please mail me if i am wrong :)
v0.7.2: Fixed wrong calculation of unread-counts, Added welcome-dialog for the first-run
v0.7.1: Fixed no virtual Categories beeing displayed on first start, fixed two unhandled Exceptions
v0.7: Improved updating of locally stored information, faster startup, better restarting of activities, fixed sorting-issues of feeds, fixed double-login, fixed progress-indicator
v0.6.8: Fixed only one article beeing displayed, Notification for finished downloads of attachments
v0.6.6: Fixed no articles beeing fetched with getArticles and problem with VirtualCategories
v0.6.5: Fixed problem with attached images, Changed update-behaviour
v0.6.4: Fix for concurrent DB-Access, SDCard not used anymore, smaller memory-footprint, added Changelog
v0.6.3: Refactored a lot, fixed some synchronisation issues, better Fling-Recognition
v0.6.2: Added the license to all files, added Update-Check
v0.6.1: Passwords can contain special characters, Download of attached Audio/Video files)
v0.6: Better check for connectivity, show attached videos and play music
